page.title: 09Religion in Cheddleton
page.content: The Anglican Church of St. Edward the Confessor, vicar Rev. Edward Farley. Rec John Hall, Curate. The parochial Church Council operates with 2 church wardens and 2 deputy church wardens. A programme of services exists and are all well attended. In addition to Sunday Services, a Pram Service is held every Thursday morning Special services are held at Christmas and for the blessing of the Carnival Queen. The Wesleyan Methodist Church of St. Andrews was rebuilt 1970 has Re. Wheelhouse as minister. In addition to two services each Sunday a junior section meets in the monday club. Both St.Edwards and St.Andrews are ecumenical and staff meet daily for prayer. Four joint services are held yearly. There is a Roman Catholic Church in St. Edwards Hospital for patient and local residents.
